issues.models module¶

module:Issues.models
synopsis:define storage models for issues
moduleauthor:anthony greau <greau.anthony@gmail.com>
created:01/07/2015
update:05/08/2015
class issues.models.Issue(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: django.db.models.base.Model

define the storage of category

Parameters:

models.Model (models object) – contain all function for define a storage
Variables:
  • Autor – User object contain autor of request
  • Assign – User object contain staff member in charge
  • Title – Title of Issue
  • UserRequest – Content of Issue
  • Answer – Staff response to UserRequest
  • CreateDate – Create date of issue
  • LastActivity – date of last activity
  • Status – status of issue (open/in progress/close)
Returns:

Issue object
Return type:

object
